title: From the Soul of Spain
description:
An hour of fine Spanish Classical guitar, with music by Albeniz, Granados, Falla, and Tarrega.  


Here is the track list:


1. Granada, Isaac Albeniz

2. Spanish Dance Number 5, Enrique Granados

3. Dedicatoria, Enrique Granados

4. Cadiz, Isaac Albeniz

5. Solea, a traditional flamenco piece

6. El Carcelero, an anonymous flamenco song

7. Alegrias, Celedoino Romero

8. Lagrima, Francisco Tarrega

9. Serenata Espanola, Joaquin Malats

10. Study in b minor, Fernando Sor

11. MillerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Dance, Manuel De Falla

12. El Noi de la Mare, a Catalan folk song

13. Canco del Lladre, a Catalan folk song

14. Leyenda, Isaac Albeniz

15. Torija, Federico Moreno Torroba

16. Sevilla, Isaac Albeniz



There is also an essay on this music, included in this torrent, called Ã¢â‚¬ËœThe Gift of Spanish MusicÃ¢â‚¬â„¢

Ã¢â‚¬ËœEach culture offers, as its unique gift, arts that could have only come from that place and people. Such is the case with Spanish musicÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Ã¢â‚¬â„¢

In all, there are three cds there that are free to listen to in their entirety online.


On that site, fans can set their own price to download things, with no minimum.

There you can even choose your format (mp3, ogg, flac, etc). Cmon, support the Arts!
